intro: Lycianthes gongshanensis, commonly known as Gongshan nightshade, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Solanaceae family, which includes nightshades, tomatoes, and potatoes. The plant typically grows in mountainous regions and has small, green leaves with yellow flowers. Its fruit is a capsule that contains several seeds. Due to its restricted distribution, it is considered a rare and endemic species.
